name: WhiTaers
detailed_description:
This is a visual novel about 20 minutes in length, telling a story of memories.
The story consists of two weeks and eight clues overlapping each other.
It tells the world of male masters' memories and reality.

WhiTaers is a story about the protagonist looking for himself from being lost.
When did people start to lose themselves?
The new journey of confusion has begun.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: i3 2GHz
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GT 625M
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i3 3GHz
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 650 Ti
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
